title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 597 - Hazardous Substances Identification, Release Prohibition, And Release Reporting
content:

State Regulations
§ 597.1 - General
§ 597.2 - Criteria for identifying a hazardous substance or acutely hazardous substance
§ 597.3 - List of hazardous substances
§ 597.4 - Spills and releases of hazardous substances

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 597

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§
3-0301[1][m], 3- 0301[2] [m], 15-0514, 37-0103, 40-0113

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
